0101011010100101 0101110110110100 1 -> sum: 1011010001011010, cout: 0
1110111010011100 1000111011111010 1 -> sum: 0111110110010111, cout: 1
1110011001101001 0101011101110010 1 -> sum: 0011110111011100, cout: 1
1001111011010010 0111111000110001 1 -> sum: 0001110100000100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
